author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Itus Corp - Co Entered Into An At Market Issuance Sales Agreement With B. Riley FBR, Inc
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Itus Corp:
* ITUS CORP - ‍ON MARCH 27, CO ENTERED INTO AN AT MARKET ISSUANCE SALES AGREEMENT WITH B. RILEY FBR, INC TO CREATE AN AT MARKET EQUITY PROGRAM​
* ITUS CORP - CO MAY SELL UP TO 2.2 MILLION SHARES OF COMPANY'S COMMON STOCK FROM TIME TO TIME THROUGH AGENT, AS SALES AGENT - SEC FILING​ Source text ( bit.ly/2pLlB21 ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
